name: I WANT TO KNOW
description:
You travel and you abide by the rules.

Your whole journey relies on those very rules which have been set. 

But who set those rules? 

Was that you?

Then what are you seeking for here, and does HE know?

The one who is sitting in front of you, reading the book you are so familiar with. 

Does HE know? 

And will HE share?

DEVELOPERS:
